info.title: Auction API
info.description: API for the Antique Items Auction Web Application

get.summary: Get a list of auto bids
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all auto bids

post.description: Creates a new auto bid with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific auto bid by UUID

put.description: Updates an existing auto bid with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the auto bid to update

delete.description: Deletes an auto bid by UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the auto bid to delete

get.description: Retrieves a list of all bid configurations

post.description: Creates a new bid configuration with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves the bid configuration for the authenticated user
Retrieves details of a specific bid configuration by UUID

put.description: Updates an existing bid configuration with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the bid configuration to update

delete.description: Deletes a bid configuration by UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the bid configuration to delete

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all bids

post.description: Creates a new bid with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific bid by UUID

put.description: Updates an existing bid with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the bid to update

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the bid to delete

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all items

post.description: Creates a new item with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific item by UUID

put.description: Updates an existing item with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the item to update

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the item to delete

post.description: Creates a new item media with the provided data

get.summary: Get base URL for item media
get.description: Retrieves the base URL for item media files
Retrieves details of a specific item media by UUID

post.description: Updates an existing item media with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the item media to update

delete.description: Deletes an item media by UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the item media to delete

get.description: Retrieves a JWT token for Mercure real-time updates
Retrieves a paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user

post.description: Marks a specific notification as read for the authenticated user
Marks all notifications as read for the authenticated user

200.description: All notifications marked as read successfully

get.description: Checks if the authenticated user has any unread notifications
Retrieves a list of active bids for the authenticated user
Retrieves a list of items awarded to the authenticated user
Retrieves a paginated list of all users

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided data

get.description: Retrieves the details of the currently authenticated user
Retrieves details of a specific user by UUID

put.description: Updates an existing user with the provided data

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the user to update

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the user to delete
